name: Leaf Me Alone (Ryfi)
description: You must uncover your yard from the infinitely falling leaves! Look out for logs! Try and beat your High Scores! Post World Records in the comments! This game was made for the Ludum Dare 40 Game Jam/Compo. The theme was "The more you have, the worse it is". I hope you enjoy! (Some browsers don't support saving high scores)
